about_the_game:
About This Game

Are you an adventurer? Do you like exotic places? If so grab your things and jump on the plane with Maya and Leo to visit the secret island in the heart of the ocean!

A mysterious land that can’t be found on any of the maps awaits you. Explore wild jungles and beautiful forests, meet the islanders and make new friends. Find treasures, solve puzzles and discover new secrets of the island. Will the brother and sister return to their busy city or will they stay on the island and make this place their new home? Let's find out.


“Forbidden fruit” is a nonlinear hentai visual novel with quest elements. You decide what path your character takes. Control their emotions and feelings with the Lust\Chastity system. Immerse yourself into the new world. Find new items and weapons to destroy your enemies with. But before you face the danger in different dungeons you must help the islanders and do some quests for them and make the bonds of friendship. This is the only way to create the party that will fight monsters beside you in your exciting journey.


Awaiting You In the Game Is
✔ A Pleasant Light and Relaxing Adventure.
✔ Dozens Of Furrys Of All Types
✔ Support for a variety of fetishes, high-quality illustrations, and animated adult content.
✔ An easy but interesting combat system.
✔ An assortment of minigames.
✔ Original relaxing music to enhance your exotic experiences.

We invite all of you to dive into a thrilling fantasy world that will bewitch your heart and mind!

“Warning! This game contains scenes of erotic nature.”

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, instances of extreme sexual themes such as non-consensual sex, BDSM, and sexual violence.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -

Minimum:

  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -

name: Forbidden Fruit

  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb

  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -

short_description: This is a story about brother and sister seeking their missing father on a mysterious island. Adventure awaits you in tropical lands full of secrets! You’ll make new friends, learn new things and battle many different enemies. Forbidden island is waiting for you.
